thread.title: Salesforce.com Unveils Software for Wealth-Management Advisers
thread.title_full: Salesforce.com Unveils Software for Wealth-Management Advisers - WSJ

author: Shira Ovide
title: Salesforce.com Unveils Software for Wealth-Management Advisers
text:
How does a business software company keep growing after it has pushed into a wide swath of offices with general-purpose tools? Go vertical.
Salesforce.com Inc., which makes software used by salespeople to keep tabs on clients and prospects, on Tuesday announced a variant of its sales-management tools tailored for a specific industry: wealth management.
In the past, Salesforce has expanded from sales into other horizontal...
